document.full_text: the indian point nuclear power plant has sought more than 100 exemptions from the fire code that could make it difficult to shut down the nearly 40-year facility in an emergency, new york's attorney general said on monday.
document.title: indian point nuclear plant a fire risk: new york
lines_and_colors: the indian point nuclear power plant has sought more than 100 exemptions from the fire code that could make it difficult to shut down the nearly 40-year facility in an emergency, new york's attorney general said on monday.
